data.eml:eml: On the type locality of Sorubim trigonocephalus Miranda-Ribeiro, 1920 (Siluriformes: Pimelodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ohara, Willian Massaharu, Neuhaus, Emanuel Bruno (2016): On the type locality of Sorubim trigonocephalus Miranda-Ribeiro, 1920 (Siluriformes: Pimelodidae). Zootaxa 4137 (2): 291-295, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.2.11
